design_philosophy.name: The Constructivist Library
design_philosophy.core_concept: Industrial Efficiency meets Human Warmth. A digital printing press for the modern age.
principles: Form follows Function: The search bar is the engine; make it massive and central.
Dynamic Asymmetry: Use diagonals and offset grids to create tension in the UI.
Typography as Image: Headings should be large, geometric, and structural.
Paper & Ink: The reading experience must feel organic, not digital. Warm backgrounds, sharp text.

headings.usage: All page titles, section headers, and the main hero statement.

ui_body.usage: Navigation, buttons, forms, dashboard metrics, metadata labels.

reader_body.usage: The actual book content in Reader Mode. CRITICAL for long-form readability.

colors.theme_strategy: Light Mode Default (Paper aesthetic). Dark Mode is 'Blueprint' style (Deep Slate #1A1A1A bg, White text, Red accents).

layout.spacing: Generous. Use p-8 to p-12 for containers. Gap-6 to Gap-8 for grids.
layout.borders: 1px solid #121212. Use 2px solid for active states or primary containers.

buttons.style: Sharp edges (rounded-none). Uppercase text. Tracking-wide. Solid background or thick outline.
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border-2 border-[#121212] text-[#121212] hover:bg-[#121212] hover:text-white transition-all

inputs.style: Massive height (h-14 or h-16). No border-radius. Thick border (2px).

cards.style: Flat background (White or Warm Grey). 1px Border. No shadow by default, hard shadow on hover.

reader_view.container: max-w-prose mx-auto px-6 py-12 bg-[#FFFEF9] shadow-sm min-h-screen

visual_enhancers.textures: Add a subtle 'noise' overlay to the body background to simulate paper grain.
visual_enhancers.shapes: Use CSS shapes (triangles, circles) in absolute positioning behind the Hero section.
visual_enhancers.motion: Snappy. Duration-200 ease-out. No bouncy springs. Linear or slight ease.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts link to the <head> of index.html immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to include the new font families (Space Grotesk, DM Sans, EB Garamond) and the custom color palette.
3. OVERRIDE SHADCN: Go to /app/frontend/src/components/ui/button.jsx and input.jsx. Remove 'rounded-md' classes. Enforce 'rounded-none'.
4. LAYOUT: Build the Landing Page using the 'Tetris Grid'. Do not center everything. Use the 'hero_background' image with a heavy opacity overlay (90% cream) so text pops.
5. READER MODE: This is the core product. It MUST use 'EB Garamond'. Ensure line-height is 1.6 or 1.7. Add a progress bar at the top.
6. SEARCH BAR: Make it the 'Hero' of the home page. It should be huge (text-2xl input).
7. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to the Search Input, Search Button, Login Button, and Book Reader Container.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) ONLY for the sticky header.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
